===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A vermilion to purplish-red powder used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to remove blood stasis, promote the subsidence of swelling, to relieve pain and arrest bleeding in the treatment of traumatic injuries with blood stasis and pain, or traumatic bleeding".
